name: CompTIA Network+ Certification
description: A globally recognized, vendor-neutral credential that validates an IT professional's foundational skills in configuring, managing, and troubleshooting wired and wireless networks

name: CompTIA Project+ Certification
description: A vendor-neutral, entry-level credential that validates the foundational skills needed to manage small- to medium-sized projects.  It covers on essential project management concepts that are applicable across a wide range of methodologies and industries.
